name: Al Mubdi
description: Al Mubdi, meaning 'The Originator', is one of the names of Allah in Islam. It signifies the act of creating something from nothing and initiating existence.
summary: The name Al Mubdi represents Allah's attribute of being the Creator and the one who brings forth life and creation. It emphasizes the divine power to start all things and highlights the concept of renewal and new beginnings.
